pathAssistantSteps.info: Unconditional Approval held, awaiting document production by Lender
Lender documents issued, awaiting return from customer
Lender documents  returned awaiting successful verification
All actions completed awaiting settlement
Settlement completed, awaiting completion of all post -settlement tasks

To include options of closed reasons

  • Won: Home Loan was successfully completed
  • Unable to Contact: Unable to make successful or ongoing contact with the member (refer notes)
  • Withdrawn - NPW: Customers circumstances have changed and/or no longer wish to proceed
  • Withdrawn - Pricing: Customers application was not able to be completed predominantly due to concerns with Pricing
  • Lost - Servicing: Customers application was not able to be completed predominantly due to concerns with Servicing
  • Lost - Policy: Customers application was not able to be completed predominantly due to concerns with Policy
  • Lost - Security: Customers application was not able to be completed predominantly due to concerns with Security
  • Lost - Ineligible: Do not meet CTM current eligibility criteria
  • Test: Test Application
  • Error: Application submitted in error
Application submitted and awaiting initial contact by Home Loan Specialist
Application currently undergoing customer engagement, verification & lender recommendation process
Credit Proposal has been issued to customer and awaiting return
Credit Proposal received and currently undergoing Flex & Lender Submission
Application Submitted to Lender and awaiting assessment
Conditional Approval held. To remain in this stage until Unconditional Approval
